channel.title: Breeding on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Breeding on COTTON

item.title: GbCML45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_D04G005070 Gene Symbol: GbCML45 Gene Name: calmodulin-like 45 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Positive roles of the Ca2+ sensors GbCML45 and GbCML50 in improving cotton Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GbCML50
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_D03G007630 Gene Symbol: GbCML50 Gene Name: calmodulin-like 50 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Positive roles of the Ca2+ sensors GbCML45 and GbCML50 in improving cotton Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhACT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A05G040150 Gene Symbol: GhACT1 Gene Name: Genome: HAU-AD1_genome_v1.

item.title: GhCAL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D07G0876 Gene Symbol: GhCAL Gene Name: Genome: The TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: High-resolution temporal dynamic transcriptome landscape reveals a GhCAL-mediated flowering regulatory pathway in cotton.

item.title: Ghir_COL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_D03G011010.1 Gene Symbol: Ghir_COL2 Gene Name: CONSTANS-like 2 Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A genome-wide association study (GWAS) was performed with 15 agronomic traits using 267 cotton accessions and identified 163 quantitative trait loci (QTL) and an important candidate gene (Ghir_COL2) for early maturity traits.

item.title: WLIM1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: WLIM1a Gene Name: LIM domain protein LIM-2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Dual Functions of WLIM1a in Cell Elongation and Secondary Wall Formation in Developing Cotton Fibers.
